Articles.Content:
Hey guys! I\'ve wasted some time making a new program called the KSP Wiki of Parts \'n Stuff (it\'s called KSPWiki inside, ignore that).

Download link is in the bottom.

Just type in \'list\' to see the list and type in the letter corresponding to the article.

Unzip the file somewhere first.

Windows, run the bat file to start the jar.

Mac, you\'ll have to run the jar somehow with a command prompt.

Really simple, has the mass, name, cost, when it was released, and the in-game description.

Has a pony feature!
How come no one likes it.. Even the pony feature I implemented?

I would try, but don\'t have Java 1.6+.

Give it a day or two, and someone\'ll try.

How come no one likes it.. Even the pony feature I implemented?

Pony feature huh? I will take a gander at this when I get home.
A pony feature? *instant download*

KSPWIKI

Y U NO LISTEN?

This was hilarious.

I mean, honestly I didn\'t try it for the Wiki, I did it for the pony feature. It\'s a pretty typical, and hilarious, reaction for a program and I thoroughly enjoyed it. I was expecting something else, but meh.

Anyway, as for the letter sequences and whatnot, good information and it\'s pretty neat.

However, like I said, didn\'t really do it for the wiki thing. I\'m sure it\'s good.

Your friendly neighborhood bag of bones,

-Drakomis

This was hilarious.

I mean, honestly I didn\'t try it for the Wiki, I did it for the pony feature. It\'s a pretty typical, and hilarious, reaction for a program and I thoroughly enjoyed it. I was expecting something else, but meh.

Anyway, as for the letter sequences and whatnot, good information and it\'s pretty neat.

However, like I said, didn\'t really do it for the wiki thing. I\'m sure it\'s good.

Your friendly neighborhood bag of bones,

-Drakomis

Thanks!

Should I do something for the 25th saying of \'my little pony\'?

Thanks!

Should I do something for the 25th saying of \'my little pony\'?

Yea, what I would do is have the program give out a message saying 'I quit' and then make itself shut down. Something along those lines.

It\'s comical, really.

Yea, what I would do is have the program give out a message saying 'I quit' and then make itself shut down. Something along those lines.

It\'s comical, really.

/start suicide.exe

It\'s easy the shut it down.


else if(ponies /*counter*/ == 25){
 System.out.println('I quit.');
 lockdown = true;
}

The program constantly checks is the boolean lockdown is true, if so, shut it down with


break;
It isn\'t very useful (you can find al the information in-game), but I suppose it\'s a nice exercise for you.

It isn\'t very useful (you can find al the information in-game), but I suppose it\'s a nice exercise for you.

I think typing a letter is easier than opening a game.

Pony Feature.

Instant Download.

Planning to add:

A SoundSystem! (plays midi (mid), ogg, and wav!)

3 sounds included (with compatibility for others in the .jar file!)

preLoad the sounds to reduce playing lag

command \'/sound \' and after the space, the name of a file you want to play! (extension must be given by you)

Program explodes after saying you-know-what 10 times

The three sounds included are

yakety-sax.mid

okiedokielokie.ogg

old_explode.ogg

Planning to add:

A SoundSystem! (plays midi (mid), ogg, and wav!)

3 sounds included (with compatibility for others in the .jar file!)

preLoad the sounds to reduce playing lag

command \'/sound \' and after the space, the name of a file you want to play! (extension must be given by you)

Program explodes after saying you-know-what 10 times

The three sounds included are

yakety-sax.mid

okiedokielokie.ogg

old_explode.ogg

Awesome, now I can listen to music while angering a computer and learning about the kerbals rocketry.

You know whatYou know whatYou know whatYou know whatYou know whatYou know whatYou know whatYou know whatYou know whatYou know what

I\'ve also changed the 25 ponies to 10 and it will explode.

Tested that if you put new sound files in, you can play it with /sound FILENAMEWITHEXTENSION

EDIT: I\'ve just realized that I\'ve finished version 1.1. Should I remove the old one and put up the new one?

Uploaded the new KSPWiki version 1.1! Go and download it!

EDIT: May have to put in some more sounds...
Where to download 1.1?

Where to download 1.1?

It\'s an attachment to the first post. It\'s been updated.

I was thinking about adding a Rocket Mode to the wiki and you could have a rocket powered by a LFE with infinite fuel. You could say \'tup\' or \'tdown\' to move the throttle from 1 to 5. There would be rate of acceleration.

Probably not.
Planning a secret (pony) surprise!
Nice pony feature
[mod]Since this has really turned out to be a nice project, I'm going to move it to the appropriate forum so it can gather more views and interest.[/mod]

Since this has really turned out to be a nice project, I\'m going to move it to the appropriate forum so it can gather more views and interest.

Thanks!
